mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `production_process_course` where parent_id=#{id} order by register_time asc

SELECT m.id,m.manufacture_id,m.product_id,m.product_name,m.amount,m.tested_amount,m.production_id_group, m.material_cost_price_sum,m.labour_cost_price_sum,m.designer,m.register,m.register_time,m.checker, m.check_time,m.check_suggestion,m.remark,m.check_tag,m.manufacture_procedure_tag,m.real_labour_cost_price_sum1,m.real_material_cost_price_sum1 (SELECT SUM(real_subtotal) FROM `production_process` WHERE parent_id=m.id) AS `real_labour_cost_price_sum`, (SELECT SUM(real_module_subtotal) FROM `production_process` WHERE parent_id=m.id) AS `real_material_cost_price_sum` FROM `manufacture_sum` m WHERE id=#{id}

select * from manufacture_sum
register_time between
#{date}
and ( manufacture_id like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or product_id like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or product_name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or product_id in (select product_id from product where initial like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')) )
order by
${orderingRule.prop} ${orderingRule.order}
process_id desc
